data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: You can also mention the points or arguments in support of your claim, which you will be further discussing in the body. This ____ comes ____ the ____ of ____ thesis ____ can ____ named ____ the ____. The ____ is a useful ____ for ____ as ____ as ____ readers. It ____ useful ____ you, because ____ way ____ will ____ more ____. In addition, your audience will have a clear cut idea as to what will be discussed in the body.
data.partBlankContent: You can also mention the points or arguments in support of your claim, which you will be further discussing in the body. This pa__ comes a_ the e__ of t__ thesis a__ can b_ named a_ the gu___. The gu___ is a useful to__ for y__ as we__ as t__ readers. It i_ useful f__ you, because th__ way y__ will b_ more orga_____. In addition, your audience will have a clear cut idea as to what will be discussed in the body.
data.fullContent: You can also mention the points or arguments in support of your claim, which you will be further discussing in the body. This part comes at the end of the thesis and can be named as the guide. The guide is a useful tool for you as well as the readers. It is useful for you, because this way you will be more organized. In addition, your audience will have a clear cut idea as to what will be discussed in the body.
data.answer: 你也可以提到支持你的论点的论点或论据，你将在正文中进一步讨论。这一部分在论文的最后，可以作为论文的指导。这本指南对你和读者都是一个有用的工具。这对你很有用，因为这样你会更有条理。此外，你的听众会对正文内容有一个清晰的概念。
